snippet: Jacob Josefson scored the tying goal with 3 minutes 31 seconds left in regulation and added the only goal in a shootout in the Devils’ 3-2 exhibition victory over the Philadelphia Flyers.
abstract: New Jersey Devils beat Philadelphia Flyers, 3-2, in preseason exhibition match.
lead_paragraph: Jacob Josefson scored the tying goal with 3 minutes 31 seconds left in regulation and added the only goal in a shootout in the Devils’ 3-2 exhibition victory over the Philadelphia Flyers.
